name: Horse
fact_1: I can sleep lying down or standing up.
fact_2: You can ride on me.
fact_3: I say "neigh!"

name: Cow
fact_1: I eat lots of grass.
fact_2: You can drink the milk I produce.
fact_3: I say "moo!"

name: Chicken
fact_1: I am a bird.
fact_2: If I am a boy, I am called a "rooster."
fact_3: I lay eggs that you can eat.

name: Sheep
fact_1: I travel in large groups, called a "flock."
fact_2: I grow very fluffy fur that you can use to make wool.
fact_3: I say "baa baa!"

name: Dog
fact_1: I have an amazing sense of smell and can hear better than humans.
fact_2: I am a pet.
fact_3: I say "woof woof!"

name: Goat
fact_1: I am a great climber and love to jump.
fact_2: I am not a picky eater.
fact_3: I have two short horns on my head.

name: Duck
fact_1: I have webbed feet that help me swim.
fact_2: I can float on water and my feathers are water-proof.
fact_3: I say "quack quack!"

name: Pig
fact_1: I like to dig in the mud.
fact_2: I have a short, round snout.
fact_3: I say "oink oink!"

name: Cat
fact_1: I always land on my feet.
fact_2: I am a pet.
fact_3: I say "meow."

name: Frog
fact_1: I can live in the water or on land.
fact_2: As a baby, I am called a "tadpole."
fact_3: I say "ribbit!"

name: Hippo
fact_1: I spend a lot of time in the water.
fact_2: I am very heavy and short.
fact_3: I have tough skin and a short nose.

name: Monkey
fact_1: I spend a lot of my time in trees.
fact_2: I eat fruits, bugs, and leaves.
fact_3: I have a very long, skinny tail.

name: Parrot
fact_1: I am a brightly colored bird.
fact_2: I am very smart.
fact_3: You can teach me how to talk.

name: Tiger
fact_1: I am the biggest species of cat in the world.
fact_2: I am a good swimmer.
fact_3: I am known for my stripes.

name: Snake
fact_1: I am a reptile.
fact_2: I don't have any legs.
fact_3: I shed my skin.

name: Lizard
fact_1: I am a reptile.
fact_2: I have four legs and scaly skin.
fact_3: I like to eat bugs.

name: Crocodile
fact_1: I am cold-blooded, so I need to lay in the sun to keep warm.
fact_2: I have tough, scaly skin and a long tail.
fact_3: I have a lot of sharp teeth and can swim.

name: Gorilla
fact_1: I am very intelligent.
fact_2: I eat bamboo, leaves, and bugs.
fact_3: I walk on all fours, but I have two hands and two feet.

name: Elephant
fact_1: I am very heavy.
fact_2: I use my long nose as a hand to grab things.
fact_3: I have big, floppy ears.

name: Giraffe
fact_1: I have a long tongue that helps me eat leaves on trees.
fact_2: I am very tall and covered in spots.
fact_3: I have a very long neck.

name: Lion
fact_1: I live in a family called a "pride."
fact_2: If I am a boy, I have lots of hair - called a "mane."
fact_3: I say "roar!"

name: Cheetah
fact_1: I am the fastest land animal in the world.
fact_2: I am known for my spotted fur.
fact_3: I am also a member of the cat family.

name: Rhino
fact_1: I am very big, but have tiny ears.
fact_2: I have big, flat feet and tough skin.
fact_3: I have horns on my nose.

name: Zebra
fact_1: I have four legs with hooves.
fact_2: I am a relative to the horse.
fact_3: I have black and white stripes all over my body.

name: Buffalo
fact_1: I travel in large groups called "herds."
fact_2: I am very tall and have shaggy hair.
fact_3: I am a distant relative to the cow.

name: Ostrich
fact_1: I am the largest bird in the world.
fact_2: I have a long neck.
fact_3: I lay giant eggs.

name: Bear
fact_1: I sleep all winter long.
fact_2: I have sharp claws and like to climb trees.
fact_3: I am fat and furry.

name: Deer
fact_1: If I am a boy, I grow large horns on my head called "antlers."
fact_2: I am a quick runner and have long legs.
fact_3: As a baby, I have spots.

name: Beaver
fact_1: I build my home in rivers from wood that I've gathered.
fact_2: I have a large flat tail.
fact_3: I have two big front teeth.

name: Squirrel
fact_1: I live in trees.
fact_2: I have a big, bushy tail.
fact_3: I like to eat nuts, fruit, and seeds.

name: Rabbit
fact_1: I have big ears.
fact_2: I hop around on my big, lucky feet
fact_3: I have a small, bushy tail.

name: Moose
fact_1: I have antlers if I'm a boy
fact_2: I'm bigger than a deer.
fact_3: I have a big nose and long legs.

name: Wolf
fact_1: I travel in a pack.
fact_2: I'm an excellent hunter.
fact_3: I howl.

name: Fox
fact_1: I live in holes that I dig called "burrows."
fact_2: I like to be by myself.
fact_3: I have a large, bushy tail and big, pointy ears.
